TITLE: Complete Product Object Structure in JSON DESCRIPTION: A complete example of the Product object showing all available fields including basic product information, pricing, subscription settings, removal settings, stock limits, tags, game servers, and commands for different lifecycle stages. SOURCE: https://github.com/paynow-gg/docs/blob/main/docs/api/product.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "150519474611560448", "store_id": "94688451781206016", "version_id": "150519521570988032", "image_url": "https://example.paynow.gg/product-image.webp", "slug": "blender", "name": "Blender", "description": "A blender. It blends stuff.", "price": 23499, "allow_one_time_purchase": true, "allow_subscription": true, "subscription_interval_value": 1, "subscription_interval_scale": "month", "remove_after_enabled": true, "remove_after_time_value": 1, "remove_after_time_scale": "month", "store_stock_limit": { "enabled": true, "quantity": 500, "time_value": 1, "time_scale": "month" }, "customer_stock_limit": { "enabled": true, "quantity": 1, "time_value": 1, "time_scale": "day" }, "stock_limit_do_not_include_removed": true, "tags": [ { "id": "124248382326706176", "slug": "food", "name": "Food" } ], "gameservers": [ { "id": "108003582208380928", "name": "test" } ], "commands": [ { "stage": "on_purchase", "content": "give {customer.steam.id} 1 blender", "online_only": true }, { "stage": "on_expire", "content": "give {customer.steam.id} 1 blender", "online_only": false } ], "created_by": { "id": "11084680073842688", "first_name": "Example", "last_name": "Exampleson" }, "created_at": "2023-04-14T06:53:01.265316Z", "updated_by": { "id": "11084680073842688", "first_name": "Example", "last_name": "Exampleson" }, "updated_at": "2023-04-14T06:53:12.460717Z" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example Product Object Structure in JSON DESCRIPTION: Complete example of a Product object showing all available fields including basic product information, stock limits, pricing details with sales and VAT information, and associated tags. Demonstrates the full data structure returned by the product endpoints. SOURCE: https://github.com/paynow-gg/docs/blob/main/docs/api/storefront-product.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "214540104499212288", "store_id": "208289304403783680", "slug": "2x-trio-500-tokens", "image_url": null, "name": "2x Trio - 500 Tokens", "description": "

Upon purchasing this product you receive 500 tokens.

", "enabled": true, "price": 1814, "sort_order": 0, "allow_one_time_purchase": true, "allow_subscription": true, "subscription_interval_value": 1, "subscription_interval_scale": "month", "stock": { "available_to_purchase": true, "customer_available": 1 }, "pricing": { "active_sale": { "id": "221398701879345152", "name": "cool sale", "discount_type": "percent", "discount_amount": 250, "minimum_order_value": 0, "begins_at": "2023-09-30T22:00:00Z", "ends_at": "2024-01-31T23:00:00Z" }, "sale_value": 374, "vat_rate": { "country_code": "CZ", "country_name": "Czech Republic", "currency": "CZK", "vat_abbreviation": "DPH", "vat_local_name": "Daň z přidané hodnoty", "eu_member_state": true, "percentage": 21 }, "price_original": 1499, "price_final": 1814 }, "tags": [ { "id": "214540052082991104", "slug": "test", "name": "test" } ], "created_at": "2023-10-07T22:48:08.842234Z", "updated_at": "2023-11-18T12:57:48.646287Z" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Accessing PayNow API Base URL DESCRIPTION: The base URL for making requests to the PayNow API gateway. SOURCE: https://github.com/paynow-gg/docs/blob/main/docs/api/reference.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` https://api.paynow.gg/v1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Webhook Verification and Processing in Go DESCRIPTION: This Go snippet sets up an HTTP server to handle webhook requests, verify signatures, prevent replay attacks, and process different event types. It uses the crypto/hmac package for HMAC calculation and implements constant-time comparison for signature verification. SOURCE: https://github.com/paynow-gg/docs/blob/main/docs/api/webhook-integration.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: go CODE: ``` package main import ( "crypto/hmac" "crypto/sha256" "encoding/base64" "encoding/json" "fmt" "io/ioutil" "log" "net/http" "os" "strconv" "time" ) const tolerancePeriod = 5 * time.Minute func getSigningSecret() []byte { return []byte(os.Getenv("SIGNING_SECRET")) } func calculateHMAC(payloadWithTimestamp string) string { h := hmac.New(sha256.New, getSigningSecret()) h.Write([]byte(payloadWithTimestamp)) return base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString(h.Sum(nil)) } func verifyWebhookSignature(next http.HandlerFunc) http.HandlerFunc { return func(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) { timestamp := r.Header.Get("paynow-timestamp") providedSignature := r.Header.Get("paynow-signature") if timestamp == "" || providedSignature == "" { http.Error(w, "Missing required headers", http.StatusBadRequest) return } timestampInt, err := strconv.ParseInt(timestamp, 10, 64) if err != nil { http.Error(w, "Invalid timestamp format", http.StatusBadRequest) return } timestampTime := time.Unix(timestampInt/1000, (timestampInt%1000)*int64(time.Millisecond)) currentTime := time.Now() if currentTime.Sub(timestampTime) > tolerancePeriod { http.Error(w, "Timestamp out of tolerance", http.StatusUnauthorized) return } body, err := ioutil.ReadAll(r.Body) if err != nil { http.Error(w, "Failed to read request body", http.StatusInternalServerError) return } defer r.Body.Close() payloadWithTimestamp := fmt.Sprintf("%d.%s", timestampInt, body) expectedSignature := calculateHMAC(payloadWithTimestamp) if !hmac.Equal([]byte(providedSignature), []byte(expectedSignature)) { http.Error(w, "Invalid signature", http.StatusUnauthorized) return } next(w, r) } } func handleWebhook(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) { var data struct { EventType string `json:"event_type"` } if err := json.NewDecoder(r.Body).Decode(&data); err != nil { http.Error(w, "Error decoding JSON", http.StatusBadRequest) return } fmt.Printf("Received event type: %s\n", data.EventType) // Process event based on data.EventType here fmt.Fprintln(w, "Webhook processed") } func main() { http.HandleFunc("/webhook", verifyWebhookSignature(handleWebhook)) port := os.Getenv("PORT") if port == "" { port = "8080" } log.Printf("Server running at http://localhost:%s/\n", port) log.Fatal(http.ListenAndServe(":"+port, nil)) } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: The Subscription Object Sample in JSON DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive example of the Subscription object JSON response showing all available fields including customer information, subscription status, billing details, product information, pricing, and timestamps. SOURCE: https://github.com/paynow-gg/docs/blob/main/docs/api/subscription.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "150580776499843072", "pretty_id": "pn-123abcd", "store_id": "94688451781206016", "customer": { "id": "11084680073842688", "first_name": "Example", "last_name": "Customer" }, "status": "active", "billing_name": "Example Customer", "billing_email": "example@customer.com", "gift": false, "gift_to_customer": null, "product_id": "123456789", "product_name": "Example Product", "product_image_url": "http://example.com/product-image.jpg", "interval_value": 1, "interval_scale": "month", "currency": "usd", "tax_inclusive": true, "price": 1000, "discount_amount": 0, "subtotal_amount": 1000, "tax_amount": 100, "total_amount": 1100, "created_at": "2023-04-11T16:42:58.197319Z", "updated_at": null, "active_at": "2023-04-11T16:42:58.197319Z", "canceled_at": null, "cancel_reason": null } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example of Customer Object Structure in JSON DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the structure of a Customer object in PayNow, including identifiers, profile information, metadata, and timestamps. SOURCE: https://github.com/paynow-gg/docs/blob/main/docs/api/customer.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "150352880618967040", "store_id": "94688451781206016", "steam_id": "76561197960287930", "steam": { "id": "76561197960287930", "name": "Rabscuttle", "avatar_url": "https://avatars.akamai.steamstatic.com/c5d56249ee5d28a07db4ac9f7f60af961fab5426_full.jpg" }, "name": "Rabscuttle", "metadata": { "example_key": "example value" }, "created_by": { "id": "11084680073842688", "first_name": "Example", "last_name": "Exampleson" }, "created_at": "2023-04-13T19:51:02.162046Z", "updated_by": { "id": "11084680073842688", "first_name": "Example", "last_name": "Exampleson" }, "updated_at": "2023-04-14T06:11:18.8643Z" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Providing Authentication with API Key Header DESCRIPTION: Example of an authorization header using an API key for store management operations. SOURCE: https://github.com/paynow-gg/docs/blob/main/docs/api/reference.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: yaml CODE: ``` Authorization: apikey 2HQQDow1G93rLVbRDe83tRP5vGDe442D2tT1XYNYYvbA ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JSON Structure: The Order Object DESCRIPTION: Defines the structure of an Order object in the PayNow.gg API, including customer details, order status, financial information, and line items. "2024-03-14T21:22:47.167958Z", "canceled_at": null } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example Error Response in JSON DESCRIPTION: The standard JSON error response structure returned by the PayNow API, including status code, error code, and message. SOURCE: https://github.com/paynow-gg/docs/blob/main/docs/api/reference.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "status": 400, "code": "InvalidInput", "message": "cannot parse Steam ID from string: clearlynotasteamid" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example Coupon Object in JSON DESCRIPTION: This snippet provides a complete example of a Coupon object in JSON format. It includes all fields of the Coupon object, demonstrating the structure and data types used for each property. The example showcases a 50% off coupon applied to specific tags and products, with various restrictions and limits. SOURCE: https://github.com/paynow-gg/docs/blob/main/docs/api/coupon.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "149580776499843072", "store_id": "94688451781206016", "enabled": true, "code": "HALF-OFF", "note": "gives the customers 50% off if their order $10.00 or more", "apply_to_tags": [ { "id": "124248382326706176", "store_id": "94688451781206016", "slug": "food", "name": "Food", "description": "delicious foods.", "created_at": "2023-04-11T19:01:04.772468Z", "updated_at": null } ], "apply_to_products": [ { "id": "124249183568797696", "store_id": "94688451781206016", "version_id": "149702205245493248", "image_url": "https://example.paynow.gg/", "slug": "banana", "name": "Banana", "description": "It literally goes bad after like, an hour...", "price": 117, "created_at": "2023-04-11T19:04:15.801636Z", "updated_at": "2023-04-12T00:45:29.064138Z" } ], "discount_type": "percent", "discount_amount": 500, "discount_apply_individually": false, "discount_apply_before_sales": false, "usable_by_customer": null, "minimum_order_value": 1000, "redeem_limit_store_enabled": false, "redeem_limit_store_amount": 0, "redeem_limit_customer_enabled": true, "redeem_limit_customer_amount": 1, "usable_on_one_time_purchase": true, "usable_on_subscription": false, "usable_at": "2023-04-11T16:42:58.163471Z", "expires_at": "2023-06-11T16:43:28.253320Z", "created_by": { "id": "11084680073842688", "first_name": "Example", "last_name": "Exampleson" }, "created_at": "2023-04-11T16:42:58.197319Z", "updated_by": { "id": "11084680073842688", "first_name": "Example", "last_name": "Exampleson" }, "updated_at": "2023-04-11T17:17:01.633842Z" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Lookup Customer Response Schema DESCRIPTION: JSON response structure when looking up a customer by PayNow ID, SteamID64, Minecraft UUID, or name. Contains customer profile information, metadata, and audit timestamps. SOURCE: https://github.com/paynow-gg/docs/blob/main/docs/api/customer.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "150352880618967040", "store_id": "94688451781206016", "steam_id": "76561197960287930", "steam": { "id": "76561197960287930", "name": "Rabscuttle", "avatar_url": "https://avatars.akamai.steamstatic.com/c5d56249ee5d28a07db4ac9f7f60af961fab5426_full.jpg" }, "minecraft_uuid": null, "profile": { "id": "76561197960287930", "platform": "steam", "name": "Rabscuttle", "avatar_url": "https://avatars.akamai.steamstatic.com/c5d56249ee5d28a07db4ac9f7f60af961fab5426_full.jpg" }, "name": "Rabscuttle", "metadata": { "example_key": "example value" }, "created_by": { "id": "11084680073842688", "first_name": "Example", "last_name": "Exampleson" }, "created_at": "2023-04-13T19:51:02.162046Z", "updated_by": { "id": "11084680073842688", "first_name": "Example", "last_name": "Exampleson" }, "updated_at": "2023-04-14T06:11:18.8643Z" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sale Object Structure in JSON DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response showing the complete structure of a Sale object. Demonstrates a 50% off sale applied to specific tags and products, with timestamps for validity period and audit fields for creation/updates. SOURCE: https://github.com/paynow-gg/docs/blob/main/docs/api/sale.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "149580776499843072", "store_id": "94688451781206016", "enabled": true, "name": "Big 50% off Sale!", "apply_to_tags": [ { "id": "124248382326706176", "store_id": "94688451781206016", "slug": "food", "name": "Food", "description": "delicious foods.", "created_at": "2023-04-11T19:01:04.772468Z", "updated_at": null } ], "apply_to_products": [ { "id": "124249183568797696", "store_id": "94688451781206016", "version_id": "149702205245493248", "image_url": "https://example.paynow.gg/", "slug": "banana", "name": "Banana", "description": "It literally goes bad after like, an hour...", "price": 117, "created_at": "2023-04-11T19:04:15.801636Z", "updated_at": "2023-04-12T00:45:29.064138Z" } ], "discount_type": "percent", "discount_amount": 500, "minimum_order_value": 0, "begins_at": "2023-04-11T16:42:58.163471Z", "ends_at": "2023-05-11T16:43:28.253320Z", "created_by": { "id": "11084680073842688", "first_name": "Example", "last_name": "Exampleson" }, "created_at": "2023-04-11T16:42:58.197319Z", "updated_by": { "id": "11084680073842688", "first_name": "Example", "last_name": "Exampleson" }, "updated_at": "2023-04-11T17:17:01.633842Z" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Example Webhook Payload for ON_DELIVERY_ITEM_USED Event DESCRIPTION: This is an example JSON payload sent when a CONSUMABLE (ONE-TIME) inventory item is used by a customer. The payload includes details about the event, customer information, order details, product information, and timing data for the delivery item lifecycle. SOURCE: https://github.com/paynow-gg/docs/blob/main/docs/api/webhook-events.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "event_type": "ON_DELIVERY_ITEM_USED", "event_id": "291252569328594944", "body": { "id": "219583037346680832", "store_id": "200303848391192576", "customer": { "id": "204676374949007360", "name": "m0uka", "steam": { "id": "76561198152492642", "name": "m0uka", "avatar_url": "https://avatars.steamstatic.com/10ce9e8c27d973ec572e3401e531c07d717c4648_full.jpg" } }, "order_customer_id": "204676374949007360", "checkout_id": null, "order_id": "219583036499443712", "order_line_id": "219583036499443713", "subscription_id": null, "execute_on_gameserver_id": null, "product_id": "215146083163058176", "product_version_id": "217392771642695680", "state": "used", "added_at": "2023-10-21T20:46:57.766222Z", "active_at": "2024-04-06T15:15:30.926575Z", "expires_at": "2024-05-06T15:15:30.926575Z", "removed_at": "2024-05-06T15:16:01.861676Z", "revoked_at": null, "revoke_reason": null } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: The Game Server Object Structure in JSON DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the structure of a Game Server object including its ID, store association, name, enabled status, token information, and metadata about creation and updates. SOURCE: https://github.com/paynow-gg/docs/blob/main/docs/api/gameserver.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "124249183568797696", "store_id": "12345", "name": "GameServer1", "enabled": true, "token": "exampletoken12345", "token_reset_at": "2023-10-25T14:12:00Z", "created_by": { "id": "11084680073842688", "email": "example@paynow.gg", "first_name": "Example", "last_name": "Exampleson", "created_at": "2023-04-13T01:26:04Z" }, "created_at": "2023-10-23T14:12:00Z", "updated_by": { "id": "11084680073842688", "email": "example@paynow.gg", "first_name": "Example", "last_name": "Exampleson", "created_at": "2023-04-13T01:26:04Z" }, "updated_at": "2023-10-25T14:12:00Z" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating a Checkout with Product and Gift Information in JSON DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the structure of a JSON request to create a new checkout. It includes fields for subscription status, product details, gift information, and quantity. SOURCE: https://github.com/paynow-gg/docs/blob/main/docs/api/storefront-checkout.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "subscription": false, "lines": [ { "product_id": "124249183568797696", "gift_to": { "platform": "example_platform", "id": "example_id" }, "gift_to_customer_id": "123456789", "quantity": 2 } ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: InventoryItem Object Structure DESCRIPTION: Example of a complete InventoryItem object showing all possible fields including customer details, order information, product data, and item state tracking. This object represents a product owned by a customer with its complete lifecycle information. SOURCE: https://github.com/paynow-gg/docs/blob/main/docs/api/customer.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": "149643503939362817", "store_id": "94688451781206016", "customer": { "id": "150352880618967040", "store_id": "94688451781206016", "steam_id": "76561197960287930", "steam": { "id": "76561197960287930", "name": "Rabscuttle", "avatar_url": "https://avatars.akamai.steamstatic.com/c5d56249ee5d28a07db4ac9f7f60af961fab5426_full.jpg" }, "name": "Rabscuttle", "metadata": { "example_key": "example value" }, "created_at": "2023-04-10T19:51:02.162046Z", "updated_at": "2023-04-11T06:11:18.8643Z" }, "order_customer": { "id": "150352880618967040", "store_id": "94688451781206016", "steam_id": "76561197960287930", "steam": { "id": "76561197960287930", "name": "Rabscuttle", "avatar_url": "https://avatars.akamai.steamstatic.com/c5d56249ee5d28a07db4ac9f7f60af961fab5426_full.jpg" }, "name": "Rabscuttle", "metadata": { "example_key": "example value" }, "created_at": "2023-04-10T19:51:02.162046Z", "updated_at": "2023-04-11T06:11:18.8643Z" }, "order_id": "149643389770407936", "order_line_id": "149643389770407937", "quantity_index": 1, "product": { "id": "124249183568797696", "store_id": "94688451781206016", "version_id": "147121000780144640", "slug": "banana", "name": "Banana" }, "state": "used", "expirable": true, "gift": false, "added_at": "2023-04-11T20:52:13.659206Z", "added_by": null, "active_at": "2023-04-11T21:52:53.66545Z", "expires_at": "2023-04-11T22:52:53.66545Z", "removed_at": "2023-04-11T22:53:55.763216Z", "revoked_at": null, "revoke_reason": null, "revoked_by": null } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Create Customer Token Response DESCRIPTION: Response format when creating a new authentication token for a customer. Returns a token string that can be used for Storefront API access. SOURCE: https://github.com/paynow-gg/docs/blob/main/docs/api/customer.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "token": "bDtsioCAvqriRbuvBA4fjqjbBApAzJo3jQ4w39LtroUfQcBkFaDAHGWdGxpMGRpkRFBf6w6" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Response Structure for Creating a Product in Paynow.gg DESCRIPTION: Shows the JSON response structure returned when successfully creating a new product. It uses crypto for HMAC calculation and implements timing-safe comparison for signature verification. SOURCE: https://github.com/paynow-gg/docs/blob/main/docs/api/webhook-integration.mdx#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` const express = require('express'); const crypto = require('crypto'); require('dotenv').config(); const app = express(); const PORT = process.env.PORT || 8080; const SIGNING_SECRET = process.env.SIGNING_SECRET; const TOLERANCE_PERIOD = 5 * 60 * 1000; // 5 minutes in milliseconds // Middleware to preserve raw body for signature verification const rawBodySaver = function (req, res, buf, encoding) { if (buf && buf.length) { req.rawBody = buf.toString(encoding || 'utf8'); } } // Function to calculate HMAC signature function calculateHMAC(payloadWithTimestamp) { const hmac = crypto.createHmac('sha256', SIGNING_SECRET); hmac.update(payloadWithTimestamp); return hmac.digest('base64'); } // Middleware to verify webhook signature and prevent replay attacks function verifyWebhookSignature(req, res, next) { const timestamp = req.headers['paynow-timestamp']; const providedSignature = req.headers['paynow-signature']; if (!timestamp || !providedSignature) { return res.status(400).send('Missing required headers'); } const timestampInt = parseInt(timestamp, 10); if (isNaN(timestampInt)) { return res.status(400).send('Invalid timestamp format'); } const timestampTime = new Date(timestampInt); const currentTime = new Date(); if (currentTime - timestampTime > TOLERANCE_PERIOD) { return res.status(401).send('Timestamp out of tolerance'); } const payloadWithTimestamp = `${timestamp}.${req.rawBody}`; const expectedSignature = calculateHMAC(payloadWithTimestamp); const signatureValid = crypto.timingSafeEqual(Buffer.from(providedSignature, 'base64'), Buffer.from(expectedSignature, 'base64')); if (!signatureValid) { return res.status(401).send('Invalid signature'); } next(); } app.use(express.json({ verify: rawBodySaver })); app.post('/webhook', verifyWebhookSignature, (req, res) => { const eventType = req.body.event_type; switch (eventType) { case 'ON_DELIVERY_ITEM_ADDED': // handleOnDeliveryItemAdded(req.body); break; case 'ON_DELIVERY_ITEM_ACTIVATED': // handleOnDeliveryItemActivated(req.body); break; case 'ON_DELIVERY_ITEM_USED': // handleOnDeliveryItemUsed(req.body); break; case 'ON_DELIVERY_ITEM_REVOKED': // handleOnDeliveryItemRevoked(req.body); break; default: console.log(`Received unknown event type: ${eventType}`); } res.status(200).send('Webhook processed'); }); app.listen(PORT, () => { console.log(`Server running at http://localhost:${PORT}/`); }); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: DELETE Cart Response Example in JSON DESCRIPTION: Example response when emptying a cart with the DELETE /store/cart endpoint.
